name: snowshoeing
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
that activity of walking over snow wearing snowshoes (= flat frames with straps of material stretched across them that can be attached to boots to allow a person to walk on snow without sinking in): Snowshoeing is a great group activity to enjoy the beautiful scenery. Mastering snowshoeing should only take a few minutes and no previous experience is necessary.

Try snowshoeing! It's as easy as strapping snowshoes on your boots and grabbing a couple of poles.
